Reverse to the way a normal engine works
normal airplanes have their crankcase

attached to its crankshaft but rotary
engines have the crankshaft attached to
the airplane and the propeller is bolted

spins around the crankshaft rather than
having the crankshaft spinning inside
the engine rotaries had a superior
